item.description:
Learn about the many triads in the Enneagram System – groups of 3 types that have important characteristics in common. Learn about your sequence – your top 3 types so instead of just a dominant number you have 3 numbers as important to you.

7:30-10pm

Option to end between 9:30-10pm

Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling, is an Enneagram expert having taught 2000 Enneagram workshops or trainings in organizations. He is a relationship coach and counselor and uses the Enneagram in his work with individuals, couples and families. He is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and also Herb's Tips for Living, both of which are available for purchase from Herb.
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Enneagram Advanced - Triads and Sequences
